item.title: LS 562: Digital Library Collection Development Policy Analysis and Services Description
LS 566: Metadata Quality Problems
item.description: William Blackerby Dr. Steven MacCall LS 566 25 September 2021 Assignment #2: Metadata quality problems In their article “Achieving and Maintaining Metadata Quality: Toward a Sustainable Workflow for the IDEALS Institutional Repository,” Stein, Applegate, and Robbins give a useful overview of the kinds of metadata quality problems that can occur in collections before detailing how they developed a workflow to address metadata problems in the institutional repository they manage. Here I will summarize the kinds of problems they discuss.
